articles.description: A dominant India scored twice in the first and fourth quarters to beat South Africa 5-2 in a classification match and finish joint ninth in the FIH Men's World Cup.
articles.content:
IMAGE: India trounced South Africa 5-2 on Saturday to finish joint ninth in the FIH Men's World Cup in Rourkela. Photograph: Hockey India/Twitter

articles.title: Ravichandran Ashwin on Shikhar Dhawan-Ishan Kishan debate: “Instead of backing a player on basis of one huge score, see what the team requires” - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Team India off-spinner Ravichandran Ashwin has opined that a player should not be backed on the basis of just one big score.
